articles.author: Joseph Menn, Ellen Nakashima
articles.title: U.S. and allies seize control of massive Chinese tech spying network - The Washington Post
articles.description: FBI Director hails successful action but calls it “just one round in a much longer fight.”
articles.content: The United States and allied countries said Wednesday they had taken control of a network of 260,000 internet-connected cameras, routers and other devices that the Chinese government had been using t… [+3610 chars]
